;==Diagonal Tile and Adjacencies (R3 Ramps)==
;---------------------------
;----BASE RAMP OVERRIDES----
;---------------------------
; This section contains transitions from the 
; base ramp pieces that allow the MIS override 
; to persist through to either diagonal or
; orthogonal MIS network pieces.
;
; A1 - diagonal mainline, orthogonal exit
; B1 - orthogonal mainline, diagonal exit
;
;----A1/B1 R3 (RHW-2)----
;0a -> Diag 02
0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57020200,2,0
0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57020200,1,0
;0a -> Stub 03
0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57000300,3,1=0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57020300,3,1
0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57000300,1,0=0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57020300,1,0
;1a -> Orth 00
0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57000000,3,0=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57020000,3,0
0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57000000,1,0=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57020000,1,0
;1a -> Stub 10
0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57020100,3,1
0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57020100,1,0
;; CURRENTLY DROPPED DUE TO COMPLICATIONS WITH RUL - THIS NEEDS
;; TO BE TESTED AND FIXED
; ; Blends (Ramp <> MRC R3)
; ; MIS yellow line inside
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906100,2,1=0x57926000,2,1,0x57926100,2,1
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906100,0,0=0x57926000,0,0,0x57926100,0,0
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906000,2,1=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57926000,2,1
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906000,0,0=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57926000,0,0
; ; MIS yellow line outside
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906100,0,0=0x57926080,0,0,0x57926180,0,0
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906100,2,1=0x57926080,2,1,0x57926180,2,1
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906000,0,0=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57926080,0,0
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906000,2,1=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57926080,2,1
;
;----D1/E1 R3 (RHW-3)----
;2a -> Diag 02
0x57B14A00,2,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57B14A00,2,0,0x57020200,2,0
0x57B14A80,0,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x57B14A80,0,1,0x57020200,1,0
;2a -> Diag Stub
0x57B14A80,0,1,0x57000300,3,1=0x57B14A80,0,1,0x57020300,3,1
0x57B14A00,2,0,0x57000300,1,0=0x57B14A00,2,0,0x57020300,1,0
;3c -> Orth
0x57B15C00,3,0,0x57000000,3,0=0x57B15C00,3,0,0x57020000,3,0
0x57B15C80,1,1,0x57000000,1,0=0x57B15C80,1,1,0x57020000,1,0
;3c -> Orth Stub
0x57B15C00,3,0,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B15C00,3,0,0x57020100,3,1
0x57B15C80,1,1,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B15C80,1,1,0x57020100,1,0
;
; ALL B1 AND E1 RAMP PIECES OVERRIDE FROM NORTH TO SOUTH, WITH
; MAINLINE HAVING A SOUTH TO NORTH OVERRIDE FOR STABILITY.
;----------------------
;----L0 MIS (0x57b2)---
;----------------------
; ORTHOGONAL B1 RAMP
; Mainline North -> South
; Orth -> 00
0x57020000,3,0,0x57b00000,3,0=0x57020000,3,0,0x57b20000,3,0
0x57020000,1,0,0x57b00080,1,1=0x57020000,1,0,0x57b20080,1,1
; 00 -> 02
0x57b20000,3,0,0x57b00200,3,0=0x57b20000,3,0,0x57b20200,3,0
0x57b20080,1,1,0x57b00280,1,1=0x57b20080,1,1,0x57b20280,1,1
; 02 -> 04
0x57b20200,3,0,0x57b00400,3,0=0x57b20200,3,0,0x57b20400,3,0
0x57b20280,1,1,0x57b00480,1,1=0x57b20280,1,1,0x57b20480,1,1
; 04 -> 07
0x57b20400,3,0,0x57b00700,3,0=0x57b20400,3,0,0x57b20700,3,0
0x57b20480,1,1,0x57b00780,1,1=0x57b20480,1,1,0x57b20780,1,1
; 07 -> Orth (covers both 01/03 orientations of RHW-2)
0x57b20700,3,0,0x57000000,3,0=0x57b20700,3,0,0x57020000,3,0
0x57b20780,1,1,0x57000000,3,0=0x57b20780,1,1,0x57020000,1,0
0x57b20700,3,0,0x57000000,1,0=0x57b20700,3,0,0x57020000,3,0
0x57b20780,1,1,0x57000000,1,0=0x57b20780,1,1,0x57020000,1,0
; 07 -> Orth Stub 
0x57B20700,3,0,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B20700,3,0,0x57020100,3,1
0x57B20780,1,1,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B20780,1,1,0x57020100,1,0
; Mainline South -> North
; Orth -> 07
0x57020000,1,0,0x57b00700,1,0=0x57020000,1,0,0x57b20700,1,0
0x57020000,3,0,0x57b00780,3,1=0x57020000,3,0,0x57b20780,3,1
; 07 -> 04
0x57b20700,1,0,0x57b00400,1,0=0x57b20700,1,0,0x57b20400,1,0
0x57b20780,3,1,0x57b00480,3,1=0x57b20780,3,1,0x57b20480,3,1
; 04 -> 02
0x57b20400,1,0,0x57b00200,1,0=0x57b20400,1,0,0x57b20200,1,0
0x57b20480,3,1,0x57b00280,3,1=0x57b20480,3,1,0x57b20280,3,1
; 02 -> 00
0x57b20200,1,0,0x57b00000,1,0=0x57b20200,1,0,0x57b20000,1,0
0x57b20280,3,1,0x57b00080,3,1=0x57b20280,3,1,0x57b20080,3,1
; 00 -> Orth (covers both 01/03 orientations of RHW-2)
0x57b20000,1,0,0x57000000,3,0=0x57b20000,1,0,0x57020000,1,0
0x57b20080,3,1,0x57000000,3,0=0x57b20080,3,1,0x57020000,3,0
0x57b20000,1,0,0x57000000,1,0=0x57b20000,1,0,0x57020000,1,0
0x57b20080,3,1,0x57000000,1,0=0x57b20080,3,1,0x57020000,3,0
; 00 -> Orth Stub 
0x57B20000,1,0,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B20000,1,0,0x57020100,1,0
0x57B20080,3,1,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B20080,3,1,0x57020100,3,1
; Mainline -> Col 1
; 02 -> 01
0x57b20200,2,0,0x57b00100,2,0=0x57b20200,2,0,0x57b20100,2,0
0x57b20280,0,1,0x57b00180,0,1=0x57b20280,0,1,0x57b20180,0,1
; 04 -> 03
0x57b20400,2,0,0x57b00300,2,0=0x57b20400,2,0,0x57b20300,2,0
0x57b20480,0,1,0x57b00380,0,1=0x57b20480,0,1,0x57b20380,0,1
; 07 -> 06
0x57b20700,2,0,0x57b00600,2,0=0x57b20700,2,0,0x57b20600,2,0
0x57b20780,0,1,0x57b00680,0,1=0x57b20780,0,1,0x57b20680,0,1
; Col 1
; 01 -> 03
0x57b20100,3,0,0x57b00300,3,0=0x57b20100,3,0,0x57b20300,3,0
0x57b20180,1,1,0x57b00380,1,1=0x57b20180,1,1,0x57b20380,1,1
; 03 -> 06
0x57b20300,3,0,0x57b00600,3,0=0x57b20300,3,0,0x57b20600,3,0
0x57b20380,1,1,0x57b00680,1,1=0x57b20380,1,1,0x57b20680,1,1
; 06 -> 09
0x57b20600,3,0,0x57b00900,3,0=0x57b20600,3,0,0x57b20900,3,0
0x57b20680,1,1,0x57b00980,1,1=0x57b20680,1,1,0x57b20980,1,1
; Col 1 -> Col 2
; 06 -> 05
0x57b20600,2,0,0x57b00500,2,0=0x57b20600,2,0,0x57b20500,2,0
0x57b20680,0,1,0x57b00580,0,1=0x57b20680,0,1,0x57b20580,0,1
; 09 -> 08
0x57b20900,2,0,0x57b00800,2,0=0x57b20900,2,0,0x57b20800,2,0
0x57b20980,0,1,0x57b00880,0,1=0x57b20980,0,1,0x57b20880,0,1
; Col 2
; 05 -> 08
0x57b20500,3,0,0x57b00800,3,0=0x57b20500,3,0,0x57b20800,3,0
0x57b20580,1,1,0x57b00880,1,1=0x57b20580,1,1,0x57b20880,1,1
; 08 -> 0a
0x57b20800,3,0,0x57b00a00,3,0=0x57b20800,3,0,0x57b20a00,3,0
0x57b20880,1,1,0x57b00a80,1,1=0x57b20880,1,1,0x57b20a80,1,1
; Col 2 -> Diagonal MIS
; 0a -> Diag
0x57B20A00,2,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57B20A00,2,0,0x57020200,2,0
0x57B20A80,0,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x57B20A80,0,1,0x57020200,1,0
; 0a -> Stub
0x57B20A80,0,1,0x57000300,3,1=0x57B20A80,0,1,0x57020300,3,1
0x57B20A00,2,0,0x57000300,1,0=0x57B20A00,2,0,0x57020300,1,0
;
; DIAGONAL A1 RAMP
; Mainline North -> East

; this one's for the diagonal when we get around to it
; ; 1a -> Orth
; 0x57B21A00,3,0,0x57000000,3,0=0x57B21A00,3,0,0x57020000,3,0
; 0x57B21A80,1,1,0x57000000,1,0=0x57B21A80,1,1,0x57020000,1,0
; ; 1a -> Stub
; 0x57B21A00,3,0,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B21A00,3,0,0x57020100,3,1
; 0x57B21A80,1,1,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B21A80,1,1,0x57020100,1,0
